source.4991f538: MaxHR vs HeartDisease plot shows that HeartDisease can not be find on the basis of MaxHR. It is because range of MaxHR is almost same for both.
source.966272d2: Above strip plot show that Resting BP range for NAP is 90-200. From this plot we can also note that there are outliers in data because it is showing BP '0' in NAP.
source.d3df228f: Above Kde plot signifies that for ASY Chest Pain most of the people have BP in range 120-140.
source.64194435: Clearly, stripplot can be used to detect wrong data. Above plot shows that value of Cholesterol is 0 for some people which is not possible.
source.ddf14786: Chances of HeartDisease is less below age 30.
source.0ab68f65: When we try to get Cholesterol range for people with Heart Disease then we come to know that range of Cholesterol is similar to that of people having no Heart Disease.
